nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, a group of escaped Wookiee slaves went into hiding on the dangerous Rryatt Trail — a long and winding trail through the enormous forests of Kashyyyk.

They found a place on the High Grounds, high dirt-covered rock formations that rose to enormous heights amidst the giant wroshyr trees. Here, the Wookiees built several primitive huts where they lived in hiding from Trandoshan slavers and the Empire.
